publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3780.1 Mr Brian Monteith: Christmas Card Recycling Scheme—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3780) in the name of Pauline McNeill, insert at end “and urges members to consider further savings in future years by making more use of e-cards where appropriate.”

S2M-3780.1 Mr Brian Monteith: Christmas Card Recycling Scheme—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3780) in the name of Pauline McNeill, insert at end “and urges members to consider further savings in future years by making more use of e-cards where appropriate.”
